full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG NGU RNAM GSAL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B CES 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG NGU RNAM GSSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA DPON MO SANGS RGYAS SGROL MA'I ZHAL 'DON DU DZA YA PAndI TA @005A *, ,BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,LEGS SO, ,
